key.name: Additional effect description on gear set for checking
Additional effect description on Lapenshard for checking

Effect activated by one of the following conditions:

Equip weapon & 4+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Behemoth</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Frostpillar Temple</font> chaos raid.
Equip weapon & 5+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Soulrend</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Blackshard Nexus</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by one of the following conditions:

Equip weapon & 4+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Dark Vanguard</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Madrakan Spire</font> chaos raid.
Equip weapon & 5+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Soulrend</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Blackshard Nexus</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by one of the following conditions:

Equip weapons & 4+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Enigma</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Rock 'n' Rollin' Pink Bean</font> chaos raid.
Equip weapon & 5+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Soulrend</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Blackshard Nexus</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by equipping the Red Lapenshard skill <font color='#FFD200'>Sword of Time (Tier 1 or higher)</font>, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Terminus of Time</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by equipping the Blue Lapenshard skill <font color='#FFD200'>Space Rift (Tier 1 or higher)</font>, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Azure Flux</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by equipping the Green Lapenshard skill <font color='#FFD200'>Eupheria's Protection (Tier 1 or higher)</font>, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Emerald Prison</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by equipping the Red Lapenshard skill <font color='#FFD200'>Sword of Time (Tier 6 or higher)</font>, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Terminus of Time</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by equipping the Blue Lapenshard skill <font color='#FFD200'>Space Rift (Tier 6 or higher)</font>, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Azure Flux</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by equipping the Green Lapenshard skill <font color='#FFD200'>Eupheria's Protection (Tier 6 or higher)</font>, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Emerald Prison</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.

Effect activated by one of the following conditions:

Equip weapon & 4+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Behemoth</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Frostpillar Temple</font> chaos raid.

Equip weapon & 5+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Soulrend</font> gear, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Blackshard Nexus</font> Eye of Lapenta raid.

Effect activated by one of the following conditions:

Equip weapon & 5+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Soulrend</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Blackshard Nexus</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.
